metadata.name: If Klimt Would Mint
metadata.description: Inspired by an immersive multimedia installation (Klimt's Kiss), which is dedicated to the life and work of the Art Nouveau pioneer Gustav Klimt, with ornamental worlds of patterns and vibrant colors, this NFT brings his art to new life with the help of AI, following the idea of the question: What would it look like if the artist would mint NFTs with checks. From the perspective of a person sitting in front of a computer, it could be seen as a representation of the ways in which technology shapes our lives, desire and connection in the digital age. Thus, traditional art and new technology come together in a harmonious, completely new and unprecedented artwork.
